# Available modules


The overview below shows which python-telegram-bot installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using python-telegram-bot, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load python-telegram-bot/20.0a0-GCCcore-10.2.0
```
